item.title: [pi] Can you help me fix my errors?
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

I’m trying to get this command to work. The purpose of the command is to reset the combat skills when they’re all 99. Can you help me fix it? ANYONE ELSE PLEASE?
if (playerCommand.equals(“prestige”)) {
for (int m = 0; m < 6; m++) {
if (c.getPA().playerLevel[m] <= 99) {
c.playerLevel[m] = 1;
c.playerXP[m] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel[0];
c.getPA().refreshSkill ;
if (c.getPA().playerLevel >= 99) {
return;
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}
}
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:125: not a statement
c.getPA().refreshSkill ;

                                                     ^

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:167: illegal start of expression
